tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UnauthorizedAccessAttempts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    access_time TIMESTAMP,
    access_location VARCHAR(100),
    access_result VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE access_monitoring_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  log_time TIMESTAMP,
  action_taken VARCHAR(100),
  details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE UnauthorizedAttempts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    time_stamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE AccessLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    action VARCHAR(20),
    time_stamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SecurityAlerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    alert_message VARCHAR(100),
    alert_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE unauthorized_attempts (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 ip_address VARCHAR(15),
 status_code INT
)

CREATE TABLE user_logs (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50),
 action_type VARCHAR(50),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE access_patterns (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 pattern_name VARCHAR(50),
 description TEXT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE access_control (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50),
 role VARCHAR(20),
 access_level INT
)
